name: Tinted Hearts
description:
Tinted hArts is an entry for the 48h Jam, GameJam+  2022

#gamejamplus22  #totem

Game Description:

Follow two artists on a symbolic journey of battling their emotions through art, in a cooperative roguelike game.

Pick up paint on the floor in order to shoot it at your enemies. Defeat enemies by attacking them with their colors. Enemies of combined colors die if you strike them together using the enemy's color combination.


Controls:

Don't forget to turn on Num Lock

Team and Game information

 - Game Name: Tinted hArts

 - Team Name: Lemon Team

 - Team Members:

Programming: Bozidar Jankovic and Yongqin Yu

Art: Alisa Kontorovic, Georgi Madzharov 

Management: Brian Barikhan

Game Description

Chosen themes:

 - Try Together

- Express yourself

- Play to learn

Categories: We are participating in the Totem category.

When achieveing the "Caretaker" Legacy event the game has a chance to generate the "D.I.N.O" level background which can be painted by the bullets of the players. Coloring the Dino green gives a special achievement.
